document_data.name: Kelpie's Kiss
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Kelpie's Kiss''''' was a ship captained by the [[half-elf]] [[Zaldar Floshin]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1485 DR]], Zaldar and his ship were docked in [[Waterdeep]] when they were hired by the [[Harpers]] to set sail in search of the ship ''[[Morkoth (ship)|Morkoth]]'' and its hostage King [[Hekaton]]. While on this mission, a Harper agent by the name of [[Ilkara Levari]] served as the ship's bosun.
document_data.Inhabitants: Zaldar kept a crew of 15 [[Tethyrian]] [[human]]s. Additionally, he had a [[sprite (creature)|sprite]] first mate by the name of [[Arrow (sprite)|Arrow]].
